title: Encore: A Bird in the Hand
dc:creator: WBUR
description: As we celebrate the winter holidays, we revisit a favorite episode from season two: Broadway legends Rebecca Luker and Danny Burstein play a talking bird and spoiled prince who explore the meaning of true wisdom.
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Encore: A Bird in the Hand
